author: pk910
content:
```
participants_matrix:
  el:
    - el_type: geth
      el_image: ethpandaops/geth:lightclient-prague-devnet-4
  cl:
    - cl_type: teku
      cl_image: consensys/teku:develop
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  min_validator_withdrawability_delay: 1
  shard_committee_period: 1
  churn_limit_quotient: 16
additional_services:
  - dora
  - apache
  - assertoor
snooper_enabled: true
dora_params:
  image: "ethpandaops/dora:pk910-electra-devnet4"
assertoor_params:
  run_stability_check: false
  run_block_proposal_check: false
  tests:
    - { file: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/assertoor/refs/heads/electra-support/playbooks/pectra-dev/all.yaml"}
```
ðŸ™‚
